thread.title: BRIEF-Punjab Alkalies And Chemicals Says IDBI Capital Markets & Securities Cuts Stake In Co By 2.95 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Punjab Alkalies And Chemicals Says IDBI Capital Markets & Securities Cuts Stake In Co By 2.95 Pct

organizations.name: brief-punjab alkalies and chemicals says idbi capital markets & securities cuts stake in co
reuters) - punjab alkalies and chemicals ltd

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Punjab Alkalies And Chemicals Ltd :
* IDBI CAPITAL MARKETS & SECURITIES CUTS STAKE IN CO BY 2.95 PERCENT TO 3.61 PERCENT Source text: bit.ly/2G6bmgE Further company coverage:
